Type.BattleDialog: Urgh… I’m still feeling nauseous.
It’s me friend’s request, so I’ll chin up and get this done.
They don’t look strong enough for me to intervene, eh?
Weh? Was that really it? That simple? This is a wee bit lackluster…
And I was excited to tell Myo about my excellent adventure ‘ere, this won’t do…
…Guess I went in too deep without a good backup plan. That was right dumb of me.
If I die ‘ere, what’ll become of Rain and Mika…
Oi, you just saw me slay that one with style, right?
My bad, my bad~ Hit you a little too hard there~ You could’ve also just tried dodging that, ey?
Seems like we’re taking a huge lead, no?
I don’t feel safe leaving that stern lass alone…
It doesn’t feel right to leave him alone… Welp, whatever.
Welp… With both of my partners dead, I wasn’t gonna make it too far by myself, anyway.
I won’t push myself any longer. Mika, Rain, thanks for your service.
…You always loved to act high and mighty and nag at me all the time, and now you leave me behind all so suddenly?
What is my Office gonna do without you, what am I going to do without you!
It’s rather intimidating to be in unfamiliar places…
I am frankly concerned… But I believe everything will work out.
What a mess we’ve gotten into…
It seems we’ve accomplished the goal. Stellar work, everyone.
Let us retrieve the information relevant to us and get out of here posthaste.
Where… did I go wrong…? I don’t want to end it already…
I can’t die already… I couldn’t even help them much yet.
…We’ve urgent matters to address.
…Rest in peace.
The operation seems to be on wheels. Let’s keep this up!
Even if I could somehow leave this place in one piece… No one would be welcoming as those two were.
You always cared for us so much, why couldn’t you take good care of your own life!
…Boss? You aren’t supposed to sleep here. …Please get up.
Sigh… Mika is quite dependable, but I just can’t trust you, Big Sis.
I guess it’s up to me and Mika to deal with all this, judging from your messy state, Big Sis…
This is pretty big for a library. I’m seeing a lot of books here…
It was rather challenging, but it was a good experience.
…There’s just too many terrifying things here. Let’s leave this place quickly.
No… This can’t be!! There’s no hope here…
Everyone is going to die… And it looks like I’m done for as well…
This one is nothing more than a cakewalk.
Another one down. Try and catch up to my score, Big Sis~
If I was just one bit careless, I’d have been the one lying cold on the floor…
…I only have my incompetence to blame. I’ll catch up to you two soon.…
So I told you multiple times, Big Sis, that you’re too sloppy…
.You acted so composed and level-headed… It’s not cool to die on us like that.
